comment: BORING TEACHER!!! If you read the book and study the slides, you'll do fine in this class. All tests are take-home & online & he gives you 3-4 days to complete. If you go to class, you're going to hear him reading slides to you. Lots of extra credit opportunities. Buy the book. The slides are simply reviews of the chapter. Lots of material!! Study.
Boring lectures, dont remember going to class a whole lot. Made an A after doing extra credit for 30 points on final grade. Tests are VERY easy and all online.

super easy, tests are all online..tons of extra credit opportunities. never went to class..but i think he started taking attendance after the first few weeks because no one was going.i had a 75 in the class and did the extra credit (which is also easy) and i made an A in the class! TAKE HIM!

Lectures are extremely boring, gives open book tests....don't buy the book, just print out the slides. Final exam is 50% of final grade, he gives you the option to do a 10-15 page research paper in place of the final....do the paper.

3 tests plus a decent amount of extra credit.   He's a good teacher and he knows what he's talking about, but his tests, even though they were open-book, were very difficult.  It seems like a large portion of what he talks about in class is not even on the tests, but he implemented extra credit just for coming.  I got a B.
Overall easy class. Tests are online and he gives A LOT of extra credit. Lectures are extremely boring, but he is an easy B.

Honkisz is a nice guy who wants to help you. He offers TONS of extra credit. He understands that this class is dry and wants his students to make a good grade. He had 3 tests and they all were open book and open note. I got an "A" in the class, but I did have to review his notes and study some. He teaches with powerpoint so it does get boring.

Seems like a genuinely nice guy, really does want you to succeed. Subject matter is dry, but he tries to keep it interesting with personal anecdotes and case studies. Offers lots of extra credit. This is a boring subject, but if you have to take it, take this guy. WebCT tests, open note.

This man is by far one of the best teachers at KSU. He is always will to help you to the fullest extent. He gives three tests and a chance for extra credit.  TAKE HIM!!! He knows his stuff. (He teaches from power points)

He used to be a lawyer so he knows what he's talking about. However, class straight from powerpoint, so it's kind of boring (it's law...) class is mostly application so it's kind of hard, but he gives LOTS of extra credit.
nice guy! allowed us to use our books and notes on the exams. takes attendance! class was pretty boring, and easy to fall asleep in... but still interesting! sometimes...
Really nice professor. Gives great study guides. Fairly easy tests. Option to write research paper or take final--write the paper.
